name: Mr. Alfred LLC-FZ
description: Developer of property management software designed to make short-term rentals easy. The company's software covers short-term rental portals and allows house owners to register on its platform and discover various properties to rent a house for a short period of time, enabling families to receive quality property management services for short-term rentals.
one_liner: Developer of property management software designed to make short-term rentals easy. The company's software covers short-term rental portals and allows house owners to register on its platform and discover various properties to rent a house for a short period of time, enabling families to receive quality property management services for short-term rentals.
